strategy: Questoris Mechanicus armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: Titan Legion formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+, all other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Questoris Mechanicus of the Adeptus Mechancius

formations.name: Questoris
formations.units: One Seneschal, two Questoris Knights (any combination of configurations)

sections.name: Cerastus Lances
sections.description: Up to one Cerasus Lance for each Questoris Lance.

formations.name: Cerasus
formations.units: One Seneschal, two Cerastus Knights (any combination of configurations)

sections.name: Armiger Lances
sections.description: Up to one Armiger Lance for each Questoris or Cerastus Lance.

sections.name: Relic Lances
sections.description: Up to one Relic Lance for each Questoris Lance.

formations.name: 0-1 Questoris Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal, two Questoris Relic Knights (any combination of configurations)

formations.name: 0-1 Acastus Reliquae
formations.units: Two Acastus Knights, each with one Seneschal (any combination of configurations)

sections.name: Skitarii, AMTL and Imperial Navy Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Skitarii, AMTL and Imperial Navy Allies.

formations.name: Hypaspist Maniple
formations.units: One Magos, nine Hypaspists, one Gorgon

formations.name: Onager Cohort
formations.units: Two Onager Dunecrawlers with Icarus Array, three Onager Dune Crawlers with another single weapon.

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans, Standard or Close Support Configuration

upgrades.title: Questoris Mechanicus Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace the Seneschal with a Baron
Add one Seneschal character to the formation
Add a Seneschal in a Dominus Knight to the formation
Add one Questoris Knight of any configuration
Replace the Seneschal's Cerastus Knight with a Cerastus Knight-Atrapos
Add one Questoris Relic Knight of any configuration
Add one Acastus Knight (of any configuration) with a Seneschal character
Upgrade both Warhounds to Tank Hunter Configuration
The Warhound Pack gains the Independent special rule
